name: vortex-math-trading-system
description: A trading backtesting system based on vortex mathematics principles

scripts.dev: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { let filePath = req.url === '/' ? '/public/index.html' : req.url; filePath = path.join(__dirname, filePath); const extname = path.extname(filePath); let contentType = 'text/html'; if (extname === '.js') contentType = 'text/javascript'; else if (extname === '.css') contentType = 'text/css'; else if (extname === '.json') contentType = 'application/json'; fs.readFile(filePath, (err, content) => { if (err) { res.writeHead(404); res.end('File not found'); } else { res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-Type': contentType }); res.end(content); } }); }); server.listen(3000, () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:3000'));"

author: Vortex Math Trading System
